info.name: Thalamus, ventral postero-lateral nucleus
info.description: The ventral postero-lateral thalamic nucleus (VPL) deals with somatosensory information from the body. Afferents to the nucleus arrive via the medial lemniscus and spinothalamic tracts. This nucleus sends efferents to post-central gyrus of cerebral cortex via the posterior limb of the internal capsule.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/5 Sag Thin Sec
